languages.text: {n}Соломон поворачивается к вам, в его зрачках пляшут огни пожара.{/n} "Если ты не шутишь... Если ты не боишься, что пожалеешь об этих словах... Если я тебе правда нужен... То я согласен". {n}Он берет вашу ладонь в свои.{/n} "Я согласен быть твоим. Навсегда и во всем".

{n}Solomorne turns to you, the flames from the fire dancing in his pupils.{/n} "If you're not joking... If you're not afraid you'll regret those words... If you really need me... Then I agree." {n}He takes your hand in his.{/n} "I agree to be yours. Forever and in all ways."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон поворачивается к вам, в его зрачках пляшут огни пожара.{/n} "Если ты не шутишь... Если ты не боишься, что пожалеешь об этих словах... Если я тебе правда нужен... То я согласен". {n}Он берет вашу ладонь в свои.{/n} "Я согласен быть твоим. Навсегда и во всем".

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンはあなたの方へ向き直った。焚き火の炎が、彼の瞳の中で揺れていた。{/n}「もしあなたの言葉が冗談ではないのなら…あなたのその言葉を後悔するのを恐れていないのなら…本当に、私を必要としてくれているのなら…私は応じます」{n}彼はあなたの手を取り、そっと包み込んだ。{/n}「あなたのものになります。永遠に、あらゆる意味で」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne turns to you, the flames from the fire dancing in his pupils.{/n} "If you're not joking... If you're not afraid you'll regret those words... If you really need me... Then I agree." {n}He takes your hand in his.{/n} "I agree to be yours. Forever and in all ways."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンはあなたの方へ向き直った。焚き火の炎が、彼の瞳の中で揺れていた。{/n}「もしあなたの言葉が冗談ではないのなら…あなたのその言葉を後悔するのを恐れていないのなら…本当に、私を必要としてくれているのなら…私は応じます」{n}彼はあなたの手を取り、そっと包み込んだ。{/n}「あなたのものになります。永遠に、あらゆる意味で」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne wendet sich dir zu, und die Flammen des Feuers tanzen in seinen Pupillen.{/n} "Falls Ihr das ernst meint ... falls Ihr keine Angst habt, diese Worte irgendwann zu bereuen ... falls Ihr mich wirklich braucht ... dann bin ich dabei." {n}Er legt deine Hand in seine.{/n} "Ich werde Euer sein. Auf ewig und in jeglicher Hinsicht."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne turns to you, the flames from the fire dancing in his pupils.{/n} "If you're not joking... If you're not afraid you'll regret those words... If you really need me... Then I agree." {n}He takes your hand in his.{/n} "I agree to be yours. Forever and in all ways."

Auf ewig und in jeglicher Hinsicht."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne se tourne vers vous, les pupilles illuminées par le reflet des flammes.{/n} « Si vous parlez sérieusement... Si vous ne craignez pas de le regretter... Si vous avez vraiment besoin de moi... Alors, j'accepte. » {n}Il prend votre main dans la sienne.{/n} « J'accepte de devenir vôtre... pour toujours et de toutes les façons possibles. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne turns to you, the flames from the fire dancing in his pupils.{/n} "If you're not joking... If you're not afraid you'll regret those words... If you really need me... Then I agree." {n}He takes your hand in his.{/n} "I agree to be yours. Forever and in all ways."

Si vous avez vraiment besoin de moi... Alors, j'accepte. » {n}Il prend votre main dans la sienne.{/n} « J'accepte de devenir vôtre... pour toujours et de toutes les façons possibles. »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne se gira hacia ti, y las llamas danzan en sus pupilas.{/n} «Si no es una broma... si no teme arrepentirse de esas palabras... si de verdad me necesita... entonces mi respuesta es sí». {n}Toma tu mano entre las suyas.{/n} «Sí, seré suyo. Para siempre y en todos los aspectos».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne turns to you, the flames from the fire dancing in his pupils.{/n} "If you're not joking... If you're not afraid you'll regret those words... If you really need me... Then I agree." {n}He takes your hand in his.{/n} "I agree to be yours. Forever and in all ways."

Para siempre y en todos los aspectos».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙转向了你，烈焰在他的瞳孔中跳动。{/n}“如果你不是在开玩笑……如果你不怕日后后悔说过这些话……如果你真的需要我……我愿意。”{n}他握住了你的手。{/n}“我愿意做你的伴侣，永不分离。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne turns to you, the flames from the fire dancing in his pupils.{/n} "If you're not joking... If you're not afraid you'll regret those words... If you really need me... Then I agree." {n}He takes your hand in his.{/n} "I agree to be yours. Forever and in all ways."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne'un sana dönüşüyle gözlerinde dans eden alevlerin yansımasını görüyorsun.{/n} "Ciddiysen... Söylediklerinden pişman olmayacaksın... Bana sahiden ihtiyacın varsa... Kabul ediyorum." {n}Ellerini tutuyor.{/n} "Senin olmayı kabul ediyorum. Her anlamda hem de, sonsuza dek."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne turns to you, the flames from the fire dancing in his pupils.{/n} "If you're not joking... If you're not afraid you'll regret those words... If you really need me... Then I agree." {n}He takes your hand in his.{/n} "I agree to be yours. Forever and in all ways."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne sana döner, gözlerinde dans eden alevlerin yansımasını görürsün.{/n} "Ciddiyseniz... Söylediklerinizden pişman olmayacaksanız... Bana sahiden ihtiyacınız varsa... Kabul ediyorum." {n}Ellerini tutmaya başlar.{/n} "Sizin olmayı kabul ediyorum. Her anlamda sonsuza dek."

languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne turns to you, the flames from the fire dancing in his pupils.{/n} "If you're not joking... If you're not afraid you'll regret those words... If you really need me... Then I agree." {n}He takes your hand in his.{/n} "I agree to be yours. Forever and in all ways."
